flawed_nl_solution:
We know all three girls ate 100 nuggets total, so 100 nuggets = 1A (how many Alyssa ate) + 2A (how many Keely ate) + 2A (how many Kendall ate) or 100 = 1A + 2A + 2A which is 100 = 1A
Then we will divide each side by 1 to figure out how many nuggets Alyssa ate, 100/1 = 1A/1 or 100.0 = A.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 1. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
